content.html: I see that I can tell Git what ssh to use using the GIT_SSH_COMMAND environment variable superuser.com/questions/2323… How can I *ask* Git what ssh it is using? "git config core.sshCommand" prints nothing. I want to know where the ssh keys for this git are being stored.
content.value:
I see that I can tell Git what ssh to use using the GIT_SSH_COMMAND environment variable superuser.com/questions/2323…

How can I *ask* Git what ssh it is using?

"git config core.sshCommand" prints nothing.

I want to know where the ssh keys for this git are being stored.
